channel.title: Mapping
channel.description: Ask general questions regarding Unreal Editor and anything related to mapping. Beginners welcome!

item.title: Adding Mutators in UnrealEd?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi, a while ago I found in Properties either in Level Properties or wherever that you can add a Mutator to a level/Map and it works with only that Map.

I have been looking for it again but I've lost it in UnrealEd 2.0 (UT2k4) and it's frustrating. I checked all the "View" properties but I know it's in there somewhere, I've used it before but ages ago so forgot.

Does anybody know where it is in UnrealEd 2.0?

It's basically an easy fix to remove the ShieldGun and AssaultRifle from the game...

Adding Mutators in UnrealEd?

item.title: FlashLight Mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Is there a Flashlight Mutator for UT2k4?

I've been looking and found one off of a Mod/Mutator pack but the (Dynamic) lighting is no good, it greys the light cone out and looks unrealistic.

I added a dynamic light on a weapon (old MP5 download) but the light stays on and isn't triggerable. Annoying

I might change the weapons' mesh to a flashlight and remove it's firemode capabilites but then its only a flashlight and not a weapon.

I was wondering if there is a mutator I haven't...

FlashLight Mutator

item.title: Importing Unreal3 Maps into 3ds max
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xivu Arath)
item.dc:creator: Xivu Arath
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys,
Is there a way to import entire Unreal 3 map models into 3ds max intact with textures? I'm attempting to work with a map in 3ds max from Painkiller: Hell and Damnation, and I haven't been able to figure out a way to make this work.

Thanks!

item.title: Exporting TexEnvMap/Shaders?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,

I am trying to export either a Shader or a TexEnvMap and I get the "Select a Texture First" window.

They are in a texture file (.utx) and I only need the selected Shader etc and not want to keep the rest of the Textures.

Apart from deleting approx 50 other textures from the pack/file and saving it as another .utx I cannot find a way around this.

Are shader/TexEnvMap 'textures' literally stuck to that certain .utx file or can they be exported?

item.title: Mastering Unreal Tech book for UT3?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I have been looking online for a similar book for UT3 to the UT2k4 "Mastering Unreal Technology".

That book was great but I cannot find a UT3 version. I have the UT3 20 hour tutorial videos but they cover map design and that's not what i'm after.

Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Wanting to create a custom map for an existing game - need help
item.author: invalid@example.com (0culus)
item.dc:creator: 0culus
item.content:encoded:
Hello All,

I'm wanting to create a custom map for a game called Nether (made with unreal) the issue is I only have access to the cooked version.

I have access to the map files (.udk) but when I try and open in the UDK editor is fails because it trys to look for the .upks which have been cooked. Is there a way to open the map as is or somehow extract the upks from the cooked files?

I Have permission from the devs to do as I please to the game. Help much appreciated

item.title: expr error 53
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I luckily keeps my files on a USB HDD but UT2k4 was in the original HDD which has died unfortunately..

I Bought a new HDD and installed UT2k4, all mods and such I had but I cannot find online the VCTF GameType Mod.

I have used a couple of StaticMeshes from VCTF in the Occupant17 Mod and its caused a huge problem, "expr error 53" ......which means some Levels have those VCTF Staticmeshes in and they won't load maps into UnrealEd!

Doesn't anybody have a link for the VTCF Gametype download?...

expr error 53

item.title: Removing Assault Rifle/ShieldGun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I have got to the stage in my Mod, Occupant 17 where I have used BW Weapons and ZenCoders etc.. as the main weapons and I want to remove the standard UT2k4 Assault Rifle and ShieldGun from the Player.

I have an interesting way of spawning so He gets whichever weapon fits that level but as usual when you flick through your weapons you still have the UT2k4 Assault/ShieldGun....

Is there an easy way to remove these or do I have to change the xPawn values;...

Removing Assault Rifle/ShieldGun

item.title: Sky box
item.author: invalid@example.com ([NBK]DxTrEm3Fx)
item.dc:creator: [NBK]DxTrEm3Fx
item.content:encoded:
Hello i'm trying to take a 180Â° panoramic photo and wrap it in a circle with Photoshop. I think it's called polar coordinates or something. Does anyone have a tutorial on this subject? I have Google it and found a bunch of tutorials but it's not UT specific, and it doesn't seem to be wrapped on the same axis.
Thank you in advance,
Dx.

item.title: Red Brush Problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I turned the brush and from now on it stays turned/twisted, I tried to reset the brush and nothing changed.

When I have a blank screen in UnrealEd the brush is normal, its only when I load a map the brush reverts back to the twisted one.

This is so annoying as the map isn't finished.

How can I make the Red Brush normal again after opening a map?

This is on the UT2004 Editor. 3369...

Red Brush Problem

item.title: Getting Started with the New Unreal Tournament
item.author: invalid@example.com (hieloco)
item.dc:creator: hieloco
item.content:encoded:
Hi everybody!

I am interested in mapping for the new UT (which I will henceforth call UT4). I wanted to ask any of you guys or gals who has had experience with it some basic questions:

1) Does UT4 utilize the latest, ever-evolving version of Unreal Engine 4 (at the time of this post version 4.8), or has it stuck with a certain branch? I ask this to avoid learning stuff for general UE4 and then finding different features in UT4.

2) Are there any good tutorials to get started with mapping?...

Getting Started with the New Unreal Tournament

item.title: WTF? Floating Vehicle?
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrSchatz777)
item.dc:creator: MrSchatz777
item.content:encoded:
Hi. My name is Mark. I am a new comer to this community forum, looking for some help with my custom vehicle. I had followed a 5 part video tutorial on Youtube, by Jamie Telford, which he includes the download to his entire project. I have made my own car in 3ds Max and followed the steps needed in the PHat, AnimSet, and AnimTree. I then took Jamie's script and changed the necessary names, such as wheel names, skeletal mesh, Physics Asset ect... I also did disable mouse camera orientation,...

WTF? Floating Vehicle?

item.title: Texture Problem. An odd one.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I have added a new Texture from Unreal Tournament 3, it was an .dds i think (?) but I re-did it for UT2004 (.tga to .dds) now and had no problems with it before.

When I saved the level and played it on UT2004 it appears in-game! It's very odd.

I delete it from my TexturePack, then a vague white texture kept appearing is the same manner.

Here's the pic from the same in-game:...

Texture Problem. An odd one.

item.title: Modding for Maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I am making a Community MOD for UT2004, a Single-Player.. Occupant17.

I am fine with the making of the maps/movies etc.. but I am a bit lost again, I thought this was the the best place to ask.

I added a post to this site in Modding but they seem to either be for certain MOD's or for UT99 so I though i'd ask here.

I have a nvidiaLogo (new one) start movie and a new Menu, new Logo/music/textures and maps.

But being a mapper I have no idea how to make a MOD in the Community section of...

Modding for Maps?

item.title: colorful tanks are not huggable
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
This is an edit CTF-Eagles, which I didn't get permission as it's often hard to track down mappers for maps that are nearly 10 years old. Not that I haven't tried, something of a crediting-whore; I may find a way to contact the guy eventually.

Mostly for my own usage, I've been editing the UTDMT (Unreal Tournament Deathmatch Titan) onto a lot of CTF & CTF4 maps. Total I've got a little over a dozen. Unlike maps like CTF-Titania, I give the thing the full range of its team's side of the...

colorful tanks are not huggable

item.title: UnrealEd (UT2004) problem.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I have the UT2004 editor and usually Matinee and Terrain windows mess up.

The type is jumbled and they cannot be used.

Does anyone know a way how to stop this or return them back to normal?

This is on the 3369 version of UT2004 on Windows 7 Home Edition, Dual Core Pentium.

item.title: So far some pics of Occupant 17
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I am making a Single-Player game for UT2004 and apart from some weapon problems with the NPC's all is good so far.

Occupant 17... you are off-plant and have to get back and also find and take various allies, who helped in the War which left you stranded on a frozen planet deep in space.

You will travel to various planets and such.

The Skaarj are your main enemy at the moment but there's a twist. I used the SKaarj skeleton models as they look so good right now but am using Maya to...

So far some pics of Occupant 17

item.title: Lost so far..
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I have gone back to working with UT2004 and decided to continue my Single-Player Mod, Occupant17 from maybe 7 years ago..

I downloaded the OSMT (Old Skool Monsta Toolz v1.53) to save time on the NPC's... as scripting/triggering them is a pain and takes up so much time. Half the time they just run the first couple of animations and then wait to be shot!

I changed mesh's on OSMT's SuperSkeletal mesh character to other's from UT2004 and in the editor it looks okay but it reverts back to the...

Lost so far..

item.title: Question about adding/subtracting BSP
item.author: invalid@example.com (WedgeBob)
item.dc:creator: WedgeBob
item.content:encoded: This was rather odd... In Unreal Editor, I was trying to add a BSP shape, and I was obviously expecting it to fill in with the BSP texture that I selected, but...I guess no matter how many times I try, it still gives me a blank BSP brush. Did I accidentally delete something that caused it to do this? Was there a setting I accidentally nudged?

item.title: Corrupted Map
item.author: invalid@example.com (msgee)
item.dc:creator: msgee
item.content:encoded:
Hey Guys,
First post, I've made a few maps back in the day for UT, there was one that I worked on for weeks maybe months, my computer crapped out and I lost my backups, but I had the most recent file. When I went into UnrealEd to open up my map again, it was corrupted, nothing showed up. I may be missing a texture pack, but is there anything I can do to try to salvage it? It's been bugging me for over 6 years that I never finished the map.

I've attached the file, does anybody know what I...

Corrupted Map
